feed.title: theausinstitute TikTok
feed.subtitle: OK Boomer, all the latest TikToks from theausinstitute

entry.title: Let us just say it for what it is: CCS is a scam. It is a scam that has been used by the coal and gas industries to con (usually willing) governments and populations into delaying climate action. #auspol #climatechange
entry.content: Let us just say it for what it is: CCS is a scam. It is a scam that has been used by the coal and gas industries to con (usually willing) governments and populations into delaying climate action. #auspol #climatechange

entry.title: "We've lost the opportunities young people used to have," Dr Fiona MacDonald, Policy Director at our Centre for Future Work, joined ABC News to give analysis on data showing that young people are working multiple jobs at record numbers as cost of living b
entry.content: "We've lost the opportunities young people used to have," Dr Fiona MacDonald, Policy Director at our Centre for Future Work, joined ABC News to give analysis on data showing that young people are working multiple jobs at record numbers as cost of living bites. #auspol

entry.title: Why is it so important to have the Voice in the Constitution? "Every organisation that we've set up has been done away in an afternoon, signed away." "Stability, so we can properly participate in the political & social life of the nation." - Pat Anderson
entry.content: Why is it so important to have the Voice in the Constitution? "Every organisation that we've set up has been done away in an afternoon, signed away." "Stability, so we can properly participate in the political & social life of the nation." - Pat Anderson AO, Alyawarre woman, on ABC's 730.

entry.title: You've probably heard the Government's "1.2 million new homes over 5 years" announcement. We've done the analysis! Verdict: It's better than nothing. But that's not saying much. Matt and Greg explain. "From 2014-19, there were 1.05 million houses built. S
entry.content: You've probably heard the Government's "1.2 million new homes over 5 years" announcement. We've done the analysis! Verdict: It's better than nothing. But that's not saying much. Matt and Greg explain. "From 2014-19, there were 1.05 million houses built. So this announcement is only 150,000 more than already expected." "Are they going to actually build 1.2 million homes themselves?" "No, they're going to provide incentives to people to build homes and invest in homes. They seem to want to spend billions and billions of dollars, but at the end of it theyâ€™ll own no houses. Frankly, it is a pretty strange thing to do." Taken from our live show Nation in a Nutshell (available in full on YouTube).

entry.title: Gas as a transition fuel? Doesn't really make sense, when the proposed Middle Arm LNG facility will have lifecycle emissions equal to 12 coal-fired power stations. #auspol #climatechange
entry.content: Gas as a transition fuel? Doesn't really make sense, when the proposed Middle Arm LNG facility will have lifecycle emissions equal to 12 coal-fired power stations. #auspol #climatechange
